title: Rare human antibodies may hold the key to a universal cure for deadly snakebites
description: A groundbreaking universal snake antivenom, derived from rare human antibodies, offers hope against deadly bites worldwide.  Developed using blood from a hyper-immune individual, this innovative approach targets multiple venom toxins, potentially saving thousands of lives in underserved regions.  Early tests show broad efficacy, marking a significant leap from traditional, species-specific treatments.

The probe involves allegations of businessman Deepak Kothari being cheated by Shilpa Shetty and her husband, Raj Kundra, who allegedly misused investment funds. Statements from five individuals, including Kundra, have been recorded as the investigation continues.

He predicts this election marks Nitish Kumar's final term as Chief Minister.

India urged Pakistan to address its own internal issues, including its economy and human rights record, rather than making baseless accusations.

title: NDA banks on 'Viksit Bihar' plank to counter opposition caste-based drive
description: The NDA, led by BJP and JDU, anticipates a strong victory in Bihar polls, campaigning on a platform of development and good governance, aiming to move past the 'Jungle Raj' era. Opinion polls project a landslide win for the alliance, while the opposition INDIA bloc is expected to focus on caste-based politics.

title: F&O trading: SEBI Chief says retail investors should assess risk capacity, avoid speculative trades
Ghaziabad: YouTuber arrested for raping Bhojpuri actor
description: A popular YouTuber with over 16 million subscribers was arrested in Patna following a complaint by a Bhojpuri film actor. She accused him of rape, religious coercion, and forced abortion. The YouTuber allegedly drugged her, married her secretly, and subjected her to abuse and pressure to convert. He also had other relationships and children.

title: Jaipur ICU blaze: Hospital staff ignored early warnings, say patients' kin
description: Families of victims in the Sawai Man Singh Hospital fire accused staff of ignoring smoke warnings and fleeing. Attendants claim their pleas were dismissed, and hospital personnel were the first to escape. Protests erupted as officials visited, with grieving relatives demanding answers about their loved ones' conditions amidst alleged police interference.

description: Bihar will vote in assembly polls on November 6 and 11. The Election Commission announced the schedule for 243 seats. Counting will take place on November 14. The elections are set to be a contest between the ruling coalition and the opposition alliance. Voter awareness and improved law and order are cited for the shorter poll duration.

Ayesha Curry's remarks on the 'Call Her Daddy' podcast, where she expressed not wanting marriage or children, have ignited a debate. Neither Stephen nor Ayesha has publicly addressed the ongoing criticism.

Pune: 17-year-old rape survivor tests HIV-positive, relative absconds; POCSO case filed
description: A 17-year-old girl in Pune tested HIV-positive. She was allegedly sexually exploited multiple times since 2021 by a distant relative. The Samarth police registered a case under the POCSO Act. The accused relative from Karnataka is currently missing. The girl's health deteriorated, leading to medical tests that revealed the abuse and her HIV status. Police are searching for the suspect.

title: NASA’s Perseverance rover spots mysterious interstellar comet 3I/ATLAS on Mars
description: NASA's Perseverance rover may have captured early images of interstellar comet 3I/ATLAS. While a viral photo shows a bright, cylindrical object, experts suggest it's likely a photographic artifact from long-exposure imaging. Amateur astronomers are analyzing data from the comet's October 3, 2025, flyby, offering a rare glimpse of this unusual visitor.

title: Congress in touch with NC leadership over Rajya Sabha seats, says Tanvir Sadiq
description: The National Conference says it is in talks with Congress to finalise a seat-sharing arrangement for the upcoming Rajya Sabha elections in Jammu and Kashmir and plans to field only local candidates

title: MP man kills lover, buries her in pit; sleeps over grave for two nights
description: A man in Niwari district allegedly murdered his married girlfriend, buried her body in his courtyard, and slept on a cot over the grave for two days. The woman's family reported her missing, leading to the accused's arrest and confession. He later escaped custody, prompting a police manhunt.

title: Trump tariffs: US President announces 25% levies on medium, heavy-duty truck imports
description: US President Donald Trump has announced a significant 25% tariff on all medium and heavy-duty trucks entering the United States, effective November 1, 2025. This move, aimed at bolstering domestic manufacturing and protecting American truck makers from foreign competition, follows a Commerce Department probe into predatory trade practices.  The tariff is part of a broader protectionist agenda.

Coldrif tragedy: Drug to fight hooch poisoning antidote to killer cough syrup
description: A drug typically used for hooch poisoning, Fomepizole, proved effective against diethylene glycol (DEG) toxicity from the killer cough syrup Coldrif. This antidote helped save children in Madhya Pradesh who suffered severe kidney damage and brain injury after consuming the contaminated syrup, preventing further fatalities.

Outrage over Indian influencer asking people to get Canada PR through babies
description: An Indian influencer's advice on having babies in Canada for PR via humanitarian grounds has sparked outrage among Canadians. The video, circulating amid anti-India sentiment, suggests this as a last resort, though not guaranteed. Critics blame the liberal government for perceived loopholes, demanding stricter immigration policies and deportations.

title: SEBI's crackdown: 17-year-old IT firm & promoters barred; accused of fund misuse
description: SEBI has banned Mumbai-based IT firm Synoptics Technologies and its promoters from the securities market pending an investigation into alleged fund diversion. The company is accused of siphoning Rs 19 crore from IPO proceeds, nearly 54% of fresh share issuance, under the guise of various fees.

title: Klay Thompson posts cozy pic with Megan Thee Stallion after dodging question
description: Klay Thompson shared intimate photos with Megan Thee Stallion online, days after publicly sidestepping a question about their romance during Media Day. This move sparked mixed reactions, highlighting his preference for privacy with reporters while celebrating their strong relationship on social media. Megan has previously praised Thompson as a genuinely nice partner.

title: Elon Musk's SpaceX wins contracts worth $714 million from Pentagon
description: SpaceX has secured a significant portion of US Space Force's military launch missions for the upcoming fiscal year, bagging five out of seven contracts worth $714 million. This reinforces Elon Musk's company's dominance in Pentagon space deals, while United Launch Alliance secured the remaining two. Blue Origin's rocket is still awaiting certification for these critical national security missions.
